review: I cannot say enough about working with Aaron Heaton as I recovered from a fall resulting in a tri-malleolar ankle/leg injury requiring surgery. Aaron was knowledgeable, professional and caring. He removed the burden of dealing with Medicare and my senior supplement from me; he responded promptly to any questions I might have; he gave sound advice while always being willing to listen. I am most satisfied with my settlement.
